practiceAreas: Personal Injury|Premises Liability|Medical Malpractice|Motor Vehicle Accidents|Product Liability
description:
The Wieand Law Firm was founded by experienced personal injury lawyer, Brent Wieand. Our firm offers high-quality legal services to people who suffered serious injuries in Pennsylvania and New Jersey. We are proud to help victims and families pursue personal injury and wrongful death compensation in a wide range of cases, including:

  • Car, truck and motorcycle accidents
  • Bus accidents and SEPTA accidents
  • Workplace injuries
  • Premises liability, including slip-and-fall accidents
  • Medical malpractice, including birth injuries and nursing home abuse

As part of his personal injury practice, we aworks to protect victims of cyber bullying and police brutality, along with protecting the rights of victims involved in drunk driving/dram shop-related accidents. In addition, we represent clients in general civil litigation, including:

  • Civil rights matters
  • Wage and hour claims
  • Whistleblower and qui tam
  • Class actions and mass torts

Regardless of your legal need, you can put your trust in the capable and determined hands of the Wieand Law Firm. If you have questions about a personal injury claim, we invite you to schedule a free initial consultation at our law office in Philadelphia, PA.
